trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"></xref> objects that are stored as key/value pairs.

Each element in an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryContract> is a key/value pair that is stored in a <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.RemoteArgumentDictionaryEntry> object.
Each key/value pair must have a unique key.
The <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryContract> interface enables the contained keys and values to be enumerated, but it does not imply any particular sort order.
Adds an element with a specified key and value to the <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryContract"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"></xref> to use as the key of the element to add.
The <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"></xref> to use as the value of the element to add.
An element with the same key already exists in the <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryContract"></xref>.
Removes all elements from the <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryContract"></xref>.
Indicates whether the <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryContract"></xref> contains an element with the specified key.
The key to locate in the <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryContract"></xref>.
`true` if the <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryContract"></xref> contains an element with the specified key; otherwise, `false`.

Returns an <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryEnumeratorContract"></xref> that can be used to iterate through the elements in the <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryContract"></xref>.
Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.

An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryEnumeratorContract"></xref> that can be used to iterate through the elements in the <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryContract"></xref>.
Returns the value of the element with the specified key.
The key of the value to return.
The <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"></xref> with the specified key.

Returns an <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentCollectionContract"></xref> that contains the keys of the <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryContract"></xref> object.

An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentCollectionContract"></xref> that contains the keys of the <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryContract"></xref> object.

Returns an <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentCollectionContract"></xref> that contains the values of the <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryContract"></xref> object.

An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentCollectionContract"></xref> that contains the values of the <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryContract"></xref> object.
Removes the element with the specified key from the <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryContract"></xref>.
The key of the element to remove.
`true` if the element is successfully found and removed; otherwise, `false`.
This method returns `false` if key is not found in the .
Replaces the value of an element.
The key of the value to replace.
The new value of the specified element.
